original_text: In transgressing and lying against the Lord, and departing away from our God, speaking oppression and revolt, conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood.
korean_text: 우리가 여호와를 배반하고 속였으며 우리 하나님을 따르는 데에서 돌이켜 포학과 패역을 말하며 거짓말을 마음에 잉태하여 낳으니

sentences.original_text: In transgressing and lying against the Lord
and departing away from our God
conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood
